comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of regular boat trips and y be the number of speed boat trips.",
    "CONSTRAINS": [
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0",
        "x + y \leq 20",
        "y \geq 0.5(x + y)",
        "20x + 30y \geq 1000"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize 10x + 20y"
}
